item.title: A Deep Dialogue on Consciousness, Fear, and Human Transformation
item.author: 寂
item.description:
In a remarkable philosophical exchange, three thinkers—克, 西恩博格, and 博姆—delve deep into the fundamental questions of human consciousness, our resistance to change, and the nature of psychological transformation. Their dialogue unveils crucial insights into the human condition and the possibilities for genuine psychological revolution.

The Human Resistance to Change
